sentence.Network_en: There's not much sustenance in a bowl of soup.
He gave money for the sustenance of a poor family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把钱给一穷人家维持生活.

sentence.Network_en: The earth brings forth large crops every year for the sustenance of man and beast.
sentence.Network_cn: 大地每年生产出大量的农作物,供人畜食用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... penance 自我惩罚 sustenance 食物，粮食，生计 provenance (艺术等的)出处，起源.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... sustain 支撑；支持，维持 sustenance 食物，营养 swallow 吞，咽.
Sometimes man require some spiritual sustenance , because it can excite our fervency in life ., 人有时候是要有点精神寄托的 , 它能激发我们对生活的热情.
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... sustenance 生计 sustenance 支撑力 Royal Ordinance 皇家法令.

list.abs: First episode 70 : 爱情公寓 iPartment -... ... 套餐 package,set menu 精神寄托 spiritual sustenance 哥斯拉 Godzilla.
To find a spiritual sustenance , to say it is also a good way ., 找一个心灵寄托 , 怎么说也是一个好办法吧.
sustenance是什么意思... ... song of sustenance1.  维持之歌 spiritual sustenance1. 精神食粮 self-sustenance1.  自给自足.
as it is , you can get the same nutritional sustenance in a slice of grain bread .如果这样，啤酒的营养和一片全麦面包是一样的。
He has gone for a week without sustenance ., 他已经一星期未吃食物了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French soustenance, from the verb soustenir (see sustain)

entry.def: Sustenance is food or drink which a person, animal, or plant needs to remain alive and healthy.

example.ex: The state provided a basic quantity of food for daily sustenance, but little else.
example.tran: 国家提供基本的日常食物供应，但除此之外就没什么了。

means.word_mean: 1. a source of materials to nourish the body
2. the financial means whereby one lives;

sentences.sentence: "each child was expected to pay for their keep"
"he applied to the state for support"
"he could no longer earn his own livelihood"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of sustaining life by food or providing a means of subsistence;

auth_sentence.content: The fur trade...gave early sustenance...to the great Canadian provinces.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fur trade...gave early sustenance...to the great Canadian provinces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fur trade...gave early sustenance...to the great Canadian provinces.

auth_sentence.content: Plankton is the main source of sustenance for these filter-feeding sharks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plankton is the main source of sustenance for these filter-feeding sharks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plankton is the main source of sustenance for these filter-feeding sharks.

auth_sentence.content: Nor is it true that bananas include moisture as well as sustenance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor is it true that bananas include moisture as well as sustenance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor is it true that bananas include moisture as well as sustenance.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着
sus在……下面+spir呼吸+e→喝望
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站得住脚的,无懈可击的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+able能……的→能拿住的
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站不住脚的,防守不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+tenable[adj.站得住脚的,无懈可击的]→adj.站不住脚的,防守不住的
con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,保持,生活费用
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man手+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→用手拿住→维修,坚持
sus下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acity表名词→tenacious名词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 租赁期限;租佃,租用,租赁
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+ancy表名词→拿[钱]租房
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
ten接住+nis→n.网球
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ure表名词→拿住状态
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
fas+ten拿住,握住,支撑→v.[使]固定，系牢，绑紧，扣紧
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
